course_description: This course will introduce a variety of African Dance styles and movement forms from the West and Central African countries. Students will understand the relationship of culture and tradition in these regions, and study the technical components of each dance form.
sections: Class Nbr: 2545, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: T. Howard, Status: Open
